tcm:Content.tcm:PublisherScript: <CompoundTemplate xmlns="http://www.tridion.com/ContentManager/5.3/CompoundTemplate"> <TemplateInvocation> <Template xlink:href="/webdav/100%20Master/Building%20Blocks/Modules/Search/Developer/Search%20Template%20Building%20Blocks/Generate%20Index%20Data.tbbcs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:title="Generate Index Data" /> <TemplateParameters> <Parameters xmlns="http://www.si4t.org/tridion/schemas/indexing-parameters"> <SearchIndexInclude>Include All Fields by Default [include]</SearchIndexInclude> <SearchIndexCustomFieldMap>title:name,headline|summary:description</SearchIndexCustomFieldMap> <SearchIndexMinTemplatePrio>200</SearchIndexMinTemplatePrio> </Parameters> </TemplateParameters> </TemplateInvocation> <TemplateInvocation> <Template xlink:href="/webdav/100%20Master/Building%20Blocks/Modules/Search/Developer/Search%20Template%20Building%20Blocks/Add%20Index%20Data%20To%20Output.tbbcs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:title="Add Index Data To Output" /> <TemplateParameters /> </TemplateInvocation> </CompoundTemplate>
